title: Tikrit Battle: U.S. And Iran-Backed Militias Are On The Same Side
teaser: In the battle to re-capture the Iraqi city from the self-proclaimed Islamic State, two influential players are fighting uncomfortably on the same side: the U.S. and Shiite militias backed by Iran.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
